     it's not a mystery to me

     quantum tunneling

     you are having thoughts, and concerns

     just 1 if it's you

     no

     yes but your sin is forgiven if you go on the christian reality show "oh fuck i married the wrong person again"

      thinking everything nowadays is bad

7.24.18  6:26 pm   i need to stop listening to why other people like music and come up with my own reasons for enjoying music

     that could be nice

7.24.18  6:02 pm   being myself seems like an appealing option and something i simply must try, but how do i know how to do that when i've mostly only been exposed to other people?

     where have you been

7.24.18  5:36 pm   what is the word that you use least frequently

     if i say it then it no longer will be

7.24.18  4:37 pm   what is your favorite magic trick?

     abiogenesis

7.24.18  4:35 pm   i don't want to talk to people anymore, it seems like there are too many things about me that put thorns into the sides of loved ones, well most people I interact with truly. I want to spend more time focusing on recording music, but I keep getting distracted by sleeping/laying down more than I need to. Any strategy to curb this?

     run away

7.24.18  4:35 pm   whats the best question you ever got

     each one is better than the previous

7.24.18  4:14 pm   what do you do when you're not working on videos (like school or work or boat)

     questions, tweets, anagrams, and other things related to bill wurtz dot com and the bill wurtz brand

7.24.18  4:03 pm   do you have secret questions you hope people will ask you

     yes

7.24.18  3:11 pm   I've become obsessed, how do I reverse this?

     write a short opera about the pros and cons of being obsessed

7.24.18  3:01 pm   how much money do you have?

     1 hundred dollars

7.24.18  3:01 pm   where are you?\

     on jeopardy, and i would be winning but i keep asking 'who is alex trebeck', i'm just so damn curious

     the entire universe

     good swimming skills

7.24.18  2:13 pm   When you hear a song where the bass is killin it, what your go to adjective for that?

     first i would need to know what killin it is your go to adjective for

7.24.18  12:59 pm   How to change my cars oil?

     it goes in the steering wheel. just take the horn off, the oil goes there. to take the horn off, hold it down for 60 seconds and it should come right off

7.24.18  12:48 pm   Are there any exotic instruments that you would want to put in a song?

     cash register?

7.24.18  12:33 pm   hey Bill was it hard for you to start expressing your slef

     no

     and how did you deal with other pepole asking questions about your music being ,,weird" (i mean pepole you meet not through the internet)

     i was actually pleasantly surprised that absolutely everyone seemed to love it, and gave it to all their friends' friends

     by the way i know the point of your music is to be weird
or at least thats what im thinking

     that's just a strategy to help break down the doors of people's unique listening filters

7.24.18  11:35 am   Bill, it's been 4 years since you released your last ep. when are you gonna release another one?

     what the heck is an ep

7.24.18  11:32 am   prove you exist

     i am trying

7.24.18  10:13 am   7.24.18  1:15 am Why are vocals so common?

     they are the primary instrument most people use to talk and speak

     I like instrumentals. A song can be good without vocals.

     that's true but it usually needs just a little something to help it find its way safely into the listener's pocket. if even just a picture of a nice lamb, to stare at whilst listening to the song

7.24.18  10:13 am   are you making despacito 2 without telling anyone

     i was but now i just told someone

     start by visiting the closest accessible place you have never been to

7.24.18  9:25 am   deal or no deal?

     how about maybe half a deal

7.24.18  9:23 am   when a dog barks at me, am i obliged to bark back?

     no

7.24.18  9:23 am   I've been wondering.......... what is ham?

     it's like the meat version of a basketball

     if it's hidden then i wouldn't say it here

     dirt

     billy joel

     i got all 5

     i usually thank the bus

     i have pictures

     it was not an accident but it still seems surprising sometimes

7.24.18  6:00 am   JAJAJAJAJAJA?

     oh that makes sense

     they would be impressed at how much younger i am than them

7.24.18  4:58 am   what are your favourite types of questions?

     bendy

7.24.18  2:56 am   what is the number one thing you've learned from this questions page?

     the answers

7.24.18  2:42 am   okay a while ago i wrote a song but i didn't write down the melody or chords or lyrics or anything. now this is fine because i still have the recording on the song, but the only problem is that I don't remember the chord progression and i don't have perfect pitch so i can't just figure it out.

     that has nothing to do with perfect pitch, but are the chords on the recording?

      how do i find out what the chords progression for the song is?

     if there are chords on the recording, then just use those chords. if there are no chords on the recording, did you know the chords originally and if so you should have included them in the recording, and if there were never any chords then now is the fun part, you get to make them up

7.24.18  1:15 am   seems like all i can do these days is spend 25 hours on a dope ass song and ruin it with shitty ass vocals

     i think you will have better results if you write it ahead of time, and accomodate the singer in the writing

7.24.18  12:44 am   have you updated the expert list with older content? i thought i clicked on all the links a while back, but there are some here that i don't remember

     i've been doing that for as long as that page has existed

7.24.18  12:37 am   make a song. that's a DEMAND.

     by coincidence i am doing it anyway

7.24.18  12:14 am   if you shrunk earth to the size of an apple what would it taste like when you take a bit out of it

     hot magma

7.23.18  11:06 pm   how much water does a watermelon contain?

     more water than melon, i can tell you that much

      how much water is in all the watermelons on earth?

     enough to fill the atlantic ocean 600 times over

      how much water is in all the watermelon-like fruits in the universe?

     there's that much in 1 watermelon

7.23.18  11:03 pm   what do you understand?

     birds

      what don't you understand?

     bees

      what did you until recently not understand that now feels completely natural?

     birds
